title: WHATS THE TRICK TO FINDING A CHAMPION U ENJOY PLAYING THAT U WILL MAIN IT
body:
EVERY CHAMPION FEELS THE SAME EVERY TIME I PLAY LOL 


THERE ISNT A CHAMPION THAT I ENJOY MORE THEN ANOTHER OR THE REST 

WHATS THE TRICk

replies.body:
Just play all the champions.

If you really don't find any champion more fun than the other, than just remember its not obligatory to main a champion. I have lots of friends who don't have a main, they just play whatever they feel like whenever.

Tbh, its probably better you don't, the jack of all trades is always better than the one trick.
